sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetails() { const [singleProduct, setSingleProduct] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_PRODUCT_API_URL + "product/" + id) .then((data) => data.json()) .then((data) => setSingleProduct(data.product)); }, []); return ( singleProduct && (

{singleProduct.name}

Product # {singleProduct._id}

${singleProduct.price}

- +

Status:{" "} {singleProduct.stock == 0 ? "Outof stock" : "In stock"}

Description:

{singleProduct.description}

Sold by: {singleProduct.seller}

) ); }
